Interface RoomDAO

SqlRoomDAO
public interface RoomDAO

Room DAO

Author:
Anreiter Simon, Moser Victoria Dorothy, Kocman Andreas Interface for storing and retrieval of Room data

Method Detail

saveRoom

void saveRoom(long hotelID,
              long roomNumber,
              int beds,
              int price)
generates and saves a new room

Parameters:
hotelID - the hotel ID of the hotel
roomNumber - the number of the new room
beds - the amount of beds in that room
price - the price per night for the new room

deleteRoom

void deleteRoom(long hotelID,
                long roomID)
deletes a room

Parameters:
hotelID - the ID of the hotel
roomID - the ID/room number of the room to be deleted

getRoomByRoomNumber

Room getRoomByRoomNumber(long hotelID,
                         long roomID)
retrieves all relevant data for a specific room

Parameters:
hotelID - the ID of the hotel
roomID - the ID/room number of the room
Returns:
a Room object with all relevant information

getRoomsForHotel

java.util.ArrayList<Room> getRoomsForHotel(long hotelID)
retrieves all room information for all rooms of a specific hotel

Parameters:
hotelID - the ID of the hotel
Returns:
an ArrayList of Room objects with all relevant information
